name: PAT_ENC_RPT_INFO
description: This table contains the result order report information for an encounter.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the report for the patient encounter.

columns.name: REPORT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of result order report created for this encounter.

columns.name: REPORT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the result order report for this encounter.

columns.name: REPORT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The status of the result order report for this encounter.

columns.name: CREATE_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time the result order report was created for this encounter.

columns.name: REPORT_AUTHOR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the system user who created the result order report for this encounter.

columns.name: REPORT_AUTHOR_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: LAST_UPDATE_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the result order report was last updated for this encounter.

columns.name: LAST_UPDATE_USR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the system user who last updated the result order report for this encounter.

columns.name: LAST_UPDATE_USR_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: SIGN_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time the result order report was signed for this encounter.

columns.name: SIGN_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the system user who signed the result order report for this encounter.

columns.name: SIGN_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: COSIGN_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The cosign status of the result order report for this encounter.

columns.name: COSIGN_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time the result order report was cosigned for this encounter.

columns.name: COSIGN_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the system user who cosigned the result order report for this encounter.

columns.name: COSIGN_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: REPORT_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order resulted in this encounter, on which the report is based.
